frontmatter.title: Wrote my first babel plugin!( Its Simple )
frontmatter.description: I wrote my first babel plugin which reduces the size of the web app my removing class methods and jsx elements. The motivation is to remove class methods which are not executed when app is viewed in mobile view.

frontmatter.title: Dynamic Components in Angular
frontmatter.description: Creating Dynamic Components in Angular with a use case of navigation

frontmatter.title: Insights into Angular ng-template, ngTemplateOutlet
frontmatter.description: Angular uses ng-template, ng-content extensively. It becomes sometimes confusing how to use this concepts and more importantly when to use it. We will see a use case where ng-template powers us to reuse a card component inside a carousel and a grid view.

frontmatter.title: Its never too late
frontmatter.description: The great aim of knowledge of education is not knowledge but action.
